name: subcss
description: Set subtitle to your videos by just using CSS

scripts.deploy:gh-pages: git checkout gh-pages && git merge --no-ff develop -m 'Merged develop into gh-pages' && git push origin gh-pages && git checkout develop
scripts.//deploy:heroku: git checkout master && git merge --no-ff develop -m 'Merged into develop' && git push origin master && git push heroku master && git checkout develop
scripts.build-css: mkdir -p dist && cssnext --verbose styles/index.css | postcss --use postcss-nested --output dist/style-$npm_package_version.css
scripts.build-js: mkdir -p dist && browserifyinc --debug --entry src/entry/web.js --transform babelify | exorcist dist/bundle-$npm_package_version.js.map > dist/bundle-$npm_package_version.js
scripts.build:web: npm run build-css && npm run build-js
